FuncDef:
The sendpacket passroute command configures an NQA trace test instance to send packets without searching the routing table.
The undo sendpacket passroute command enables an NQA trace test instance to send packets based on the routing table. The sendpacket passroute command configures an NQA trace test instance to send packets without searching the routing table. The undo sendpacket passroute command enables an NQA trace test instance to send packets based on the routing table. By default, an NQA test instance sends packets with searching the routing table.
ExtraInfo:
To configure an NQA test instance to send packets without searching the routing table, run the sendpacket passroute command.
The sendpacket passroute command is applicable to the following scenarios:
No source IP address is set.
